detail_desc: Short cold shoulder dress in crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Straight-style nightdress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounced trim over the shoulders and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the top and a flared skirt.

Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in an airy rami and viscose weave containing some cotton. Regular waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Short skirt in a patterned cotton weave with a concealed zip in one side and scalloped hem. Unlined.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave with a lined, detachable hood with an elasticated edge and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elasticated waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Blouse in a softly draping weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a sheen. Opening with ties at the front, gathers at the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and a straight skirt with a rounded hem.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit wool with a V-neck, large, tone-on-tone buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves. Wide elasticated knit trim at the cuffs and hem.
Bandeau bras in microfibre with elastication at the top, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
Nursing tops in soft viscose jersey with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Gently fitted jacket in a textured weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, welt front pockets and sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has a button fastening at one side and decorative buttons at the other. Zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Non-wired mesh bra with embroidered appliqués and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Hat in soft, garter-stitched cotton with small knitted ears on top and a ribbed hem.
Shorts in a linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped trims.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back. The polyamide content of the briefs is recycled.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, one button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with creases.

Fitted, calf-length dress in viscose jersey with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Double layer at the top with wrapover, draped sections, close-fitting, extra-long sleeves and an asymmetric skirt with a high slit in one side. Lined.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a round neckline that has an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and short, flounced sleeves.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bra in mesh and satin with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length dress in patterned, semi-transparent mesh with a round neckline and long sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and a flared, softly draping skirt. Lined with a soft jersey underdress that has narrow shoulder straps.
Skirt in cotton twill. High waist with concealed elastication, a fly with visible buttons and patch pockets front and back. Unlined.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
Romper suit in fine-knit cotton with frills at the top, shoulder straps, buttons at the back and elasticated hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a super-high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Chinos in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Long jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Cardigan in a fine knit with shiny metal buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and front pockets.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a drawstring hood, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a raw-edge, rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and raw-edge hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Sunglasses with wood-patterned plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
High-waisted trousers in sturdy jersey in a narrow cut at the top with pleats, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and wide, super-flared legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, faux fur jacket with a wide, lace-trimmed collar with imitation suede underneath. Concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Hairband in a braided cotton weave with covered elastic at the back.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, a zip at the sides and buttoned cuffs.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved blouse in airy chiffon with broderie anglaise. V-neck with pin-tucks, buttons down the front, frill details at the top and a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Wide jersey hairband with a knot-detail at the front.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with visible flatlock seams in a contrasting colour, and a reflective print detail at the hem.
Top in jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a  V-neck and short cap sleeves.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist and skinny legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover at the front of the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with broderie anglaise. V-neck, covered buttons down the front and short, voluminous, elasticated puff sleeves.
Metal earrings with fabric tassels. Length 13 cm.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Frill-trimmed V-neck, a frill-trimmed yoke front and back, dropped shoulders, short, flounced sleeves, and a scalloped hem. Slightly longer at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Microfibre Brazilian briefs with laser-cut edges, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
